name: Hats?
description:
You will receive no instruction, tutorials, or communication in general. Good luck!

Developed during the Global Game Jam 2015 @ Northeastern University. Link

Theme of the jam was: "What do we do now?".

Team members: Matt Long, Nicole Amidon, Kristi Nikolla, Walton Lee, Nathan Low, Sarah Zaidan, Rui Jiang
